articles.author: Susobhan Roy
articles.title: Russia To Probe Pager Attack? Putin’s Offer To ‘Friend’ Lebanon After Tech Blasts |Hezbollah |Israel - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia's Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia at UN Security Council meeting, criticised Israel's bombardment and targeted attacks in Lebanon and Gaza, labeling them as a “grim daily reality.” He condemned the recent electronic device explosions in Lebanon and Syria, …
